Author: alerae2020
Text: Im going to go on a walk right now. Im thinking of parking further away from work too if i dont have to pay the meters. Its just so hard once i lose my discipline, i already lose weight soo slowly but i gain like its nothing. Thankfully its so nice out lately so i have no excuse not to go walking

Author: Syd_Squid24
Text: Try adding an hour of brisk walking everyday. Exercise always seems to help push the scale in the other direction for me. I am in the same boat right now. A few weeks ago I lost around 6 pounds through restricting and exercise and felt on top of the world. And because of that I started eating like crazy and gained it all back in a matter of 2-3 weeks. I feel like complete and utter shit. But I swore to myself I will get through this little hiccup and get back on track
